alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Lajas; San German (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 10 at 4:07PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Cabo Rojo, Hormigueros, Lajas and San German. * WHEN...Until 615 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 307 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lajas, San German, Cabo Rojo, Hormigueros, Sabana Grande, Monte Grande, Puerto Real, Sabana Eneas, Betances, Boqueron, La Parguera, Pole Ojea and Palmarejo. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Lajas; San German
